INSERT INTO piwik_url_module SELECT pllva.idsite, pllva.idaction_url url_id, concat('http://', pla1.name) url_name, pllva.idaction_name module_id, pla2.name module_name FROM (SELECT DISTINCT idsite, idaction_url, idaction_name FROM piwik_log_link_visit_action) pllva LEFT JOIN piwik_log_action pla1 ON pllva.idaction_url = pla1.idaction LEFT JOIN piwik_log_action pla2 ON pllva.idaction_name = pla2.idaction WHERE pla1.type = 1 AND pla2.type = 4
